AUTHOR: Swann
SHORT: Cog to support weeb.sh by Wolke
DESCRIPTION: Wrapper for Wolke's anime image macro API, weeb.sh. Requires an API key!
INSTALL_MSG: This will install Swann's wrapper for weeb.sh. Make sure you get an API key from Wolke, and use [p]weebkey <key> to set it! Usage: [p]<image|any_image_category>
NAME: WeebSh
